name: quicklinks-automation
title: Quicklinks Automation
description: This extension allows you to create and launch a set of quicklinks in a row, automating your workflow.
author: ClaPalo

commands.name: create-automation
commands.title: Create Automation
commands.description: Create a new sequence of quicklinks to be executed in a row

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
